means: 环境，周围的事物( surrounding的名词复数)

sentence.Network_en: It took her a while to get acclimatized to her new surroundings.
sentence.Network_cn: 她花了一段时间才适应了新的环境。

sentence.Network_en: It must have reinforced my determination to blend into my surroundings.
sentence.Network_cn: 这势必让我更加下定决心融入周围环境。

sentence.Network_en: He was an expert at finding his way, even in strange surroundings.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是认路的行家，即使在陌生的环境中也是如此。

entry.def: When you are describing the place where you are at the moment, or the place where you live, you can refer to it as your surroundings .

example.ex: Schumacher adapted effortlessly to his new surroundings.
example.tran: 舒马赫非常轻松地适应了新环境。

example.ex: ...a peaceful holiday home in beautiful surroundings.
example.tran: 环境优美宁静的度假屋

means.word_mean: 2. the area in which something exists or lives;

auth_sentence.content: Once settled, he likes to explore his surroundings.
auth_sentence.res_content: Once settled, he likes to explore his surroundings.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Once settled, he likes to explore his surroundings.

auth_sentence.content: The subdued...surroundings of this elegant French restaurant soothe patrons.
auth_sentence.res_content: The subdued...surroundings of this elegant French restaurant soothe patrons.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The subdued...surroundings of this elegant French restaurant soothe patrons.

auth_sentence.content: Does the same whisky taste different in different surroundings?
auth_sentence.res_content: Does the same whisky taste different in different surroundings?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Does the same whisky taste different in different surroundings?

Sentence.sentence: The unique surroundings of his living place.
In wider and more difficult areas of life, there is evidence to indicate that natural surroundings improve all kinds of things
Those whose accommodation had more natural views showed an improvement of 19%; those who had the same improvement in material surroundings but no nice view improved just 4%.
They are better able to adapt to the surroundings.

sentences.cn: 他们生活在优美的环境中。

jushi.english: The surroundings which a child grows up in may have an effect on his development.
jushi.chinese: 小孩生长的环境会影响他的发展。
他们生活在优美的环境中。
